tool.name: geomorphUnitConverter

param.name: fc
param.dialogReference: A feature class which containts the composite mapunits.

param.name: independent
param.dialogReference: The name of the field containing the composite key (often PTYPE):

tool.summary: This tool splits up the mapunits commonly used in surficial mapping. From an indepentent field (commonly PTYPE), which encodes information about thin veneers and interlaced units, the primary unit, underlying unit, subordinate interlaced unit, and the original composite unit are parsed out and added into new fields.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool splits up the mapunits commonly used in surficial mapping. From an indepentent field (commonly PTYPE), which encodes information about thin veneers and interlaced units, the primary unit, underlying unit, subordinate interlaced unit, and the original composite unit are parsed out and added into new fields.
